thread.title: 15 Times Shane From "The L Word" Sparked Your Sexual Awakening

author: Katie Heaney
title: 15 Times Shane From "The L Word" Sparked Your Sexual Awakening
text:
View this image ›
Showtime ID: 10425235 2. When she made smoking cigarettes SO HOT (sorry!!!). View this image ›
Showtime ID: 10425239 3. When she made you want to be a set of headphones. View this image ›
Showtime ID: 10425309 4. When she even pulled off whatever this look is. View this image ›
Showtime ID: 10425313 5. And when she worked whatever this hat is. View this image ›
Showtime ID: 10425424 6. When she stopped being polite and started getting REAL. View this image ›
Showtime ID: 10425332 7. On the rare occasions she actually broke out in a full-on smile. View this image ›
Showtime ID: 10425336 8. When she was as sweet to Carmen as Carmen deserved. View this image ›
Showtime ID: 10425427 9. When she rocked the white muscle tank so much better than Ryan Atwood ever could. Showtime ID: 10426134 10. Whenever she supported her friends, which was pretty much all the time. View this image ›
Showtime ID: 10425400 11. When she looked someone up and down and you wished that it were you. View this image ›
Showtime ID: 10425298 12. Whenever she got rant-y about couples’ bullshit. View this image ›
Showtime ID: 10425489 13. Whenever she gave advice in that husky, sultry voice of hers. View this image ›
Showtime ID: 10425550 14. Whenever she kissed anyone, but especially when she kissed Carmen. View this image ›
Showtime ID: 10425454 15. And when she scowled her way through the “Looking very Shane today” ad campaign. Showtime o_O
